metadata.description: How to use the camera on the Canvas

sections.title: What is the Camera?
sections.text: The canvas has a concept of a Camera, this allows you to move freely around your work area and zoom in and out

sections.title: How do I Move with a Mouse?
How do I Move with a Trackpad?
How do I Zoom in and Out with a Mouse?
sections.text: If you use a mouse with a scroll-wheel, you can scroll the wheel to zoom in and out.

sections.title: How do I Zoom in and Out with a Trackpad?
sections.text: If you are using a trackpad, you can use a two-finger gesture to zoom in and out

sections.title: Other Zoom methods
sections.text: Alternatively, you can use the slider in the timeline toolbar
